r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added support for >footnote< and >footnoteref< - Added anchor generation for various elements - Added option (-s/--skip) to skip rendering of chunks - Reformatted package.xml for readability and consistency - Merged README.RENDERER into README and updated README with current information - Gwynne is a developer of PhD, unfortunately - Footnotes should be rendered starting from 1, not 0
